title: I'm really confused. Did I just get banned or not?
body:
I'm freaking tf out right now. I just got a message last game saying that I was banned for 2 weeks. I'm wondering if this is a joke from a friend or not, because I can still play. I even restarted the client. Please, what's going on.

Edit: It was a joke from a "friend". I'm so fucking relieved. Please don't do this to anyone on your friends list. Nearly had a damn heart attack.

replies.body: If it's the account you're posting from, I'm not really seeing anything out of the ordinary.  Glad it was just a ruse.  Not funny, friends!  :D
